channel.title: United States on Joseph C
channel.description: Recent content in United States on Joseph C

item.title: Tracking the presidency
item.description: Built the tracker page for The Economist monitoring the first 100 days of Trump’s presidency as well as a breakdown of his favourability rating.

item.title: The Economist US election forecast
item.description: This project represents the final results of our work to design and build the interactive visualisations for the Economist’s 2024 US election forecast. This prediction model includes visualisations for the Presidential race as well as the House and Senate.
